blogPost.title: What are some examples of companies that have made famously successful digital transformations? Answer by @joelbarbier, Director of Thought Leadership at Cisco. https://t.co/Sgw0fNpbnj https://t.co/EGpyuwZIEB
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: デジタルトランスフォーメーションを成功させた有名な企業の例を教えてください。Answer by @joelbarbier, Director of Thought Leadership at Cisco. https://t.co/Sgw0fNpbnj https://t.co/EGpyuwZIEB
有哪些公司进行了著名的成功的数字化转型的例子？回答者：@joelbarbier，思科公司思想领导力总监。https://t.co/Sgw0fNpbnj https://t.co/EGpyuwZIEB
有哪些公司進行了著名的成功的數字化轉型的例子？回答者：@joelbarbier，思科公司思想領導力總監。https://t.co/Sgw0fNpbnj https://t.co/EGpyuwZIEB

previous.title: How do you build an authentic workplace culture in a remote environment? Answer by @hollysirkin, VP of People at Unison. https://t.co/SNVZOZN0rp https://t.co/jTCjSrdpN6

localize.full_text: リモート環境で本物の職場文化を構築するには？回答者：@hollysirkin, VP of People at Unison. https://t.co/SNVZOZN0rp https://t.co/jTCjSrdpN6
如何在远程环境中建立一个真实的工作场所文化？回答者：@hollysirkin，Unison的人事副总裁。https://t.co/SNVZOZN0rp https://t.co/jTCjSrdpN6
如何在遠程環境中建立一個真實的工作場所文化？回答者：@hollysirkin，Unison的人事副總裁。https://t.co/SNVZOZN0rp https://t.co/jTCjSrdpN6

next.title: How is our culture of misinformation affecting the role of honesty in business? Answer by @sabrinahorn, Founder CEO at HORN Strategy. https://t.co/v3aASDpvlY https://t.co/Bu2UOz2ct4

localize.full_text: 誤報の文化は、ビジネスにおける正直者の役割にどのような影響を与えているのでしょうか？Answer by @sabrinahorn, Founder CEO at HORN Strategy. https://t.co/v3aASDpvlY https://t.co/Bu2UOz2ct4
我们的错误信息文化是如何影响商业中的诚信作用的？回答者：@sabrinahorn，HORN战略公司的创始人CEO。https://t.co/v3aASDpvlY https://t.co/Bu2UOz2ct4
我們的錯誤信息文化是如何影響商業中的誠信作用的？回答者：@sabrinahorn，HORN戰略公司的創始人CEO。https://t.co/v3aASDpvlY https://t.co/Bu2UOz2ct4
